newsitem.title: CANADA: First Australia Prime sets dividend.
newsitem.headline: First Australia Prime sets dividend.

text.p: First Australia Prime Income Investment Co Limited said on Tuesday it would pay a dividend of C$0.11 per share (equivalent to approximately U.S.$0.081 per share).

The dividend consists of a regular monthly payment of C$0.09 per share (approximately U.S.$0.066) as well as a special year-end distribution of C$0.02 per share (approximately U.S.$0.015). The dividend is payable on January 15, 1997 to all shareholders of record on December 31, 1996.
The company kept its monthly dividend of C$0.09 and its board of directors said it is determined to maintain the dividend at a current level of C$0.09.
First Australia is a closed-end investment company.
